channel.title: 100DaysToOffload on A blog by Yosua Ian Sebastian

item.title: My First Pi-hole
item.description: Putting a 7 y.o Raspbian model 2 to work.

item.title: Can you use Apple Watch for HR monitor in Zwift?
SQLFluff Is a Thing
item.description: A fluff that I wish I had known earlier.

item.title: My 2022 Without Context
item.description: Would writing out past events with less context help me see it more objectively? A writing experiment!

item.title: Can - Will - Did
item.description: I can do it. Actually, I will do it. Finally, I did it!

item.title: Focusing Is Hard For Current Me
item.description: These days, I can not focus on one thing for extended amount of time.
